tool_description: Collabinate provides an API for hosted activity streams, allowing you to seamlessly build social feeds, microblogging, and collaboration into your application.
name: Collabinate
title: Collabinate

api_list.name: Get All Following
api_list.description: Returns the set of entities followed by the given user.

optional_parameters.name: skip
optional_parameters.description: Used for paging. The number of entities to skip before returning a set of entities. Defaults to 0.

optional_parameters.name: take
optional_parameters.description: Used for paging. The number of entities to return. Defaults to 20.

api_list.name: Get Comments
api_list.description: Retrieves the set of comments for a given activity.

required_parameters.name: entityid
required_parameters.description: The ID of the entity which contains the activity for which to get the comments.

required_parameters.name: activityid
required_parameters.description: The ID of the activity to which the comments belong.

optional_parameters.name: start
optional_parameters.description: Used for paging. The number of comments to skip before returning a set of comments. Defaults to 0.

optional_parameters.name: count
optional_parameters.description: Used for paging. The number of comments to return. Defaults to 20.

api_list.name: Get Following
api_list.description: Returns a follow activity if the given user follows the given entity, or a 404 not found otherwise.

required_parameters.name: userid
required_parameters.description: The ID of the user to check.

required_parameters.name: entityid
required_parameters.description: The ID of the entity to check.

api_list.name: Get Activity
api_list.description: Returns a single activity within a given stream.

required_parameters.name: entityid
required_parameters.description: The ID of the entity from which's stream the activity will be retrieved.

required_parameters.name: activityid
required_parameters.description: The ID of the activity to retrieve.

optional_parameters.name: comments
optional_parameters.description: The number of comments on the activity to embed in the response. Note that setting this to any value (even 0) will embed a collection that contains a value for the count of all comments on the activity, along with a set of the most recent comment objects up to the number specified. For high volume usage, leave this parameter out of the query for best performance.

optional_parameters.name: likes
optional_parameters.description: The number of likes on the activity to embed in the response. Note that setting this to any value (even 0) will embed a collection that contains a value for the count of all likes on the activity, along with a set of like objects up to the number specified. For high volume usage, leave this parameter out of the query for best performance.

api_list.name: Get Likers
api_list.description: Returns a set of users that like a given activity.

required_parameters.name: entityid
required_parameters.description: The ID of the entity which has the liked activity in its stream.

required_parameters.name: activityid
required_parameters.description: The ID of the activity for which to retrieve the liking users.

optional_parameters.name: skip
optional_parameters.description: Used for paging. The number of users to skip before returning a set of users. Defaults to 0.

optional_parameters.name: take
optional_parameters.description: Used for paging. The number of users to return. Defaults to 20.

api_list.name: Get Followers
api_list.description: Returns the set of users that follow the given entity.

optional_parameters.name: skip
optional_parameters.description: Used for paging. The number of users to skip before returning a set of users. Defaults to 0.

optional_parameters.name: take
optional_parameters.description: Used for paging. The number of users to return. Defaults to 20.

api_list.name: Get Comment
api_list.description: Gets a single comment on an activity.

required_parameters.name: entityid
required_parameters.description: The ID of the entity which contains the activity with the comment in its stream.

required_parameters.name: activityid
required_parameters.description: The ID of the activity to which the comment belongs.

api_list.name: Get Entity
api_list.description: Gets an ActivityStreamsObject representing an Entity or User.

api_list.name: Get Stream
api_list.description: Returns a set of activities for an entity in reverse chronological order up to the amount in the take query variable, starting after the skipping the number of activities in the skip query variable.  If not specified, skip defaults to zero, and take defaults to 20.

required_parameters.name: entityid
required_parameters.description: The ID of the entity for which the stream will be retrieved.

optional_parameters.name: skip
optional_parameters.description: Used for paging. The number of activities to skip before returning a set of activities. Defaults to 0.

optional_parameters.name: take
optional_parameters.description: Used for paging. The number of activities to return. Defaults to 20.

optional_parameters.name: comments
optional_parameters.description: The number of comments on each activity to embed in the response. Note that setting this to any value (even 0) will embed a collection that contains a value for the count of all comments on each activity, along with a set of the most recent comment objects up to the number specified. For high volume usage, leave this parameter out of the query for best performance.

optional_parameters.name: likes
optional_parameters.description: The number of likes on each activity to embed in the response. Note that setting this to any value (even 0) will embed a collection that contains a value for the count of all likes on each activity, along with a set of like objects up to the number specified. For high volume usage, leave this parameter out of the query for best performance.

api_list.name: Get Like
api_list.description: Checks whether a like relationship exists between a user and a single activity.

required_parameters.name: userid
required_parameters.description: The ID of the user to check.

required_parameters.name: entityid
required_parameters.description: The ID of the entity which has the liked activity in its stream.

required_parameters.name: activityid
required_parameters.description: The ID of the activity to check if the user likes.

api_list.name: Get Feed
api_list.description: Returns a set of activities for the entities followed by a user in reverse chronological order up to the amount in the take query variable, starting at the activity in the position after the skip variable.  If not specified, skip defaults to zero, and take defaults to 20.

required_parameters.name: userid
required_parameters.description: The ID of the user for which the feed will be retrieved.

optional_parameters.name: skip
optional_parameters.description: Used for paging. The number of activities to skip before returning a set of activities. Defaults to 0.

optional_parameters.name: take
optional_parameters.description: Used for paging. The number of activities to return. Defaults to 20.

optional_parameters.name: comments
optional_parameters.description: The number of comments on each activity to embed in the response. Note that setting this to any value (even 0) will embed a collection that contains a value for the count of all comments on each activity, along with a set of the most recent comment objects up to the number specified. For high volume usage, leave this parameter out of the query for best performance.

optional_parameters.name: likes
optional_parameters.description: The number of likes on each activity to embed in the response. Note that setting this to any value (even 0) will embed a collection that contains a value for the count of all likes on each activity, along with a set of like objects up to the number specified. For high volume usage, leave this parameter out of the query for best performance.
